SELECT A.TOT_CNT , A.RNUM , A.COMP_ID , A.UPPR_MENU_ID , A.MENU_SEQ , A.MENU_ID , A.MENU_NM , A.USE_YN , MENU_Lvl1 , MENU_Lvl2 , MENU_Lvl3 , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DTM , A.ROW_STATUS FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOT_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MENU_SEQ ASC) AS RNUM , COMP_ID , UPPR_MENU_ID , MENU_SEQ , MENU_ID , MENU_NM , CASE WHEN USE_YN != 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE USE_YN END AS USE_YN , CASE WHEN MENU_Lvl1 != 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE MENU_Lvl1 END AS MENU_Lvl1 , CASE WHEN MENU_Lvl2 != 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE MENU_Lvl2 END AS MENU_Lvl2 , CASE WHEN MENU_Lvl3 != 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE MENU_Lvl3 END AS MENU_Lvl3 , REG_ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, REG_DTM, 120) AS REG_DTM
, UPD_ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR, UPD_DTM, 120) AS UPD_DTM
, 'R' AS ROW_STATUS FROM MENU_MANAGE
AND (MENU_ID = #{searchMenuId} OR MENU_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchMenuId}, '%'))
AND USE_YN = #{searchUseYn}
ORDER BY MENU_SEQ ASC OFFSET #{pageSize} * (#{curPage} - 1) ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY ) A
